msg: cleanup of rgb() and implementation of system-color()

author: ate
msg: Now supporting Page "edit" state as well as nested layout actions.
Depends on major changes to the layout templates (columns.vm and tcolumns.vm).

author: ate
msg: Added more generic methods to add a Portlet to a layout or remove a fragment to be able to support nested layouts.
Also refactored the existing onces to make use of these new methods.

author: ate
msg: Had to relax the testconditions a bit because Page.getRootFragment() isn't always called anymore since my last fix to DecorationFactoryImpl.
